// Modules for registers
#include "modules/modules.h"

// Begin
BEGIN REG_ARRAY_NAME

// Conf
GROUP CONF, 0
// Nominal values
REG U_NOM, conf.p_U_nom, IQ15, CONF
REG I_NOM, conf.p_I_nom, IQ15, CONF

!// Sys
!GROUP SYS, 100
!REG ERRORS, sys.errors, U32, NONE
!REG WARNINGS, sys.warnings, U32, NONE

// ADC
GROUP ADC, 200
// Phases voltage
// Raw
REG UA_RAW, adc.out_Ua_raw, U32, NONE
REG UB_RAW, adc.out_Ub_raw, U32, NONE
REG UC_RAW, adc.out_Uc_raw, U32, NONE
// Rel
REG UA, adc.out_Ua, IQ24, NONE
REG UB, adc.out_Ub, IQ24, NONE
REG UC, adc.out_Uc, IQ24, NONE
// Calibration
REG UA_GAIN,   adc.p_Ua_gain,  IQ24, CONF
REG UA_OFFSET, adc.p_Ua_offset, U32, CONF
REG UB_GAIN,   adc.p_Ub_gain,  IQ24, CONF
REG UB_OFFSET, adc.p_Ub_offset, U32, CONF
REG UC_GAIN,   adc.p_Uc_gain,  IQ24, CONF
REG UC_OFFSET, adc.p_Uc_offset, U32, CONF

// Phase and Amplitude.
GROUP PHASE_AMPL, 300
!REG UA_VALUE, Ua_phase_ampl.out_value, IQ24, NONE
REG UA_PHASE, Ua_phase_ampl.out_phase, IQ24, NONE
REG UA_AMPL, Ua_phase_ampl.out_ampl, IQ24, NONE
REG UB_PHASE, Ub_phase_ampl.out_phase, IQ24, NONE
REG UB_AMPL, Ub_phase_ampl.out_ampl, IQ24, NONE
REG UC_PHASE, Uc_phase_ampl.out_phase, IQ24, NONE
REG UC_AMPL, Uc_phase_ampl.out_ampl, IQ24, NONE

GROUP RMS, 350
REG UA, Ua_rms.out_value, IQ24, NONE
REG UB, Ub_rms.out_value, IQ24, NONE
REG UC, Uc_rms.out_value, IQ24, NONE

!// Measurement
!GROUP MEAS, 400
!REG UA_GAIN,   meas.gain_Ua,   IQ24, CONF
!REG UA_OFFSET, meas.offset_Ua, IQ24, CONF
!REG UB_GAIN,   meas.gain_Ub,   IQ24, CONF
!REG UB_OFFSET, meas.offset_Ub, IQ24, CONF
!REG UC_GAIN,   meas.gain_Uc,   IQ24, CONF
!REG UC_OFFSET, meas.offset_Uc, IQ24, CONF

// End
END
